collection:
This Privacy
Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how it is used,
and the steps we take to ensure your personal data is handled appropriately
while using our resume generator service.

### Data Collection and Use

Our resume generator service collects only the essential data required for
rendering and returning your resume.

This includes, but is not limited to,
personal details, employment history, education, skills, and any other
information you provide in your resume.

### Analytics

We collect basic analytics data to improve our service.

This includes the
number of visits, generated resumes per user, and other similar usage metrics.
sharing:
We do not share, sell, or rent your personal data to
third parties for their marketing purposes.
